def_en: A gesture is a movement that you make with a part of your body, especially your hands, to express emotion or information.

def_cn: （表明态度或意图的）姿态，表示
def_en: A gesture is something that you say or do in order to express your attitude or intentions, often something that you know will not have much effect.

def_cn: 打手势；用手势表示；用动作示意
def_en: If you gesture, you use movements of your hands or head in order to tell someone something or draw their attention to something.
